title: Rainy city street driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy day in the city, with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.4 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid potential accidents with other vehicles or pedestrians.
